MS MCQs

    Deploy Azure Sentinel and connect data sources

    »

    1. How does Azure Sentinel use machine learning and AI?

      Feedback loop detection

      Alert detection

      Security score


    2. Azure Sentinel hunting and search-and-query tools are based on which of the following?

      Center for Internet Security best practices

      MITRE ATT&CK framework

      Microsoft Security Development Lifecycle (SDL)


    3. The Azure Sentinel agent is which of the following?

      Log Analytics agent

      REST API

      Certificate


    4. Which of the following actions can the Azure Sentinel Reader role perform?

      Edit workbooks

      Review data, incidents, workbooks, and other Azure Sentinel resources.

      Create and run Azure Sentinel security playbooks


    5. Which of the following is required to connect Azure Sentinel to Azure AD?

      You need an Azure AD P1 or P2 license

      You must use Azure AD Connect

      Azure AD Domain Services must be enabled
